pullRequest.title: Add support for Avro OCF using InputFormat
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Implements support for reading files in Avro Object Container Format with the new native indexing InputFormat interface.

This PR has:

 been self-reviewed.
 added documentation for new or modified features or behaviors.
 added unit tests or modified existing tests to cover new code paths.
 been tested in a test Druid cluster.


Key changed/added classes in this PR

AvroOCFInputFormat
AvroOCFReader

commit.message: Support supplying a reader schema in AvroOCFInputFormat
Add docs for Avro OCF input format

afterCommit.message: Add docs for Avro OCF input format
